    Subclasses of MutatorOperator in org.netgene.ga.mutator
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BitFlipMutator
    In this bit flip mutation, we select one or more random bits and flip them.
    class 
    GaussianMutator
    The GaussianMutator class performs the mutation of a NumericGene.
    class 
    IntegerMutator
     
    class 
    InversionMutator
    In Inversion Mutation we select a subset of our genes and reverse their order.
    class 
    RandomMutator
    In random resetting mutation, we select one or more genes and replace their values with another random value from their given ranges.
    class 
    ScrambleMutator
    In Scramble Mutation we select a subset of our genes and scramble their value.
    class 
    SwapMutator
    In swap mutation, we select two positions on the chromosome at random, and interchange the values.
